Please see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=272764 for more information on using AjaxControlToolkit.

Getting Started
---------------
See devexpress.com/ms-act for more information on how to get the latest version.

Upgrading from earlier version
------------------------------
Please see https://ajaxcontroltoolkit.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Upgrade%20your%20project%20to%20AjaxControlToolkit%20v15.1 for more information on how to 
upgrade to version 15.1
